Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Social Media Support Specialist Consumer Services Sports Equipment Posted/Updated: 10-26-2015 Brief Job Description: Provide a premium consumer service support experience by monitoring and responding to inbound service related messages in a variety of our communities via phone, social media, email and live chat.
